column2: Architecture and code guidelines we use at ribot when developing for Android

column5: Add new line under the class declaration

Switched TAG to use getSimpleName()

This will match the string format style used previously

Replaced hardcoded string for class name

Switched to using getName() on the class object rather than a hardcoded string. Ensures that the TAG is updated when refactoring the class name.
